__e: You've given me the adventure of a lifetime in one night.
I think you know, Sam, that when things we care about go away, it can be easy to forget our place in the journey.
You know, Memory Lane Adventure actually sounded fun when you first came up with it, but now I'm starting to think this was just another scam to make us do your work for you.
Doesn't mean I can't go for a little adventure and see the world.
How do you think it feels when everyone asks you how the adventure was, and you got to say that no one asked you to go along, that you weren't needed?
- But you were right, it's not about the money, I only steal things for the adventure, and today, with you, I want more days like this.
